name: 逗国科举 | Douguo Keju
description:
The imperial examination is coming! The second small games in the tour area are rich in content and can not be missed.





Background:

In the ancient and mysterious East, there is a funny state. The king of funny state Funny King was deeply influenced by the Central Plains culture. He followed the example of China and established the funny state imperial examination system, which was called funny state imperial examination in history. The National Entertainment Examination is a complete civil service selection system, which elects countless capable ministers for the National Entertainment Examination. However, because of the topic of the National Entertainment Examination system, the ideology of intellectuals is restrained, and the various teasing intellectuals of the National Entertainment Examination system are banished.



Gameplay:

The National Entrance Examination is a question-and-answer game. Obviously, it's time to test your IQ. If you are a smart person, you can pass the exam again and again quickly. You will be a successful scholar and enter the cabinet to create your own infinite brilliance.

Following the ancient imperial examination system of China, including private school test, children's birth test, rural test, meeting test, Palace test, and finally according to the achievements, the National Entrance Examination has won the champion list. Let's see what kind of brilliant life you will have if you were born in the National Entrance Examination.



The game includes:

Random game question bank over 300 questions: let your life is full of challenges, whether you can win at the age of 20, 23 can enter the core of the empire, depending on your play.

Over many life outcomes: According to your different performance, there will be different life outcomes, and before Meng Po Tang, take a good look at your magnificent life.

The 5 two time examiners: the characteristics of our country, our female examiners are all gentle but strict.

The 20 achievement: the difficulty of achievement is different, and the whole achievement is still very difficult.



Game features:

The random ending system of the game will sum up your life according to the performance of your answers. Comrades, it takes a lot of hard work to complete it perfectly once.
